sub_topic: Prove that the Cartesian product of two sets is distributive over union.
message_1: Consider the sets A = {1, 2, 3} and B = {2, 3, 4}. Find the Cartesian product of A and B, and then find the union of the Cartesian product of A and {1} with the Cartesian product of B and {1}. Finally, prove that the Cartesian product of A union B and {1} is equal to the union of the Cartesian product of A and {1} with the Cartesian product of B and {1}.
